channel.title: I have issues
channel.description: Will someone please help me? On a delta 317 base some of the monsters/npc's that I put into the server won't do damage, they just hit zeros, how do i fix this?

item.title: I have issues
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

Hmm, I’m doing a similar thing, but you know

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad rand_npc = misc.random(500); }

What does the 500 represent?

Read full topic

item.title: I have issues
item.dc:creator: @legionkiller99 legionkiller99
item.description:
@legionkiller99 wrote:

You will have to add the npc id’s in Npchandler.java

Search for if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad rand_npc = misc.random(500); }

Copy and paste it beneath it, then change the id to your own, and the 500 to your own value.

Search for if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad hitDiff = misc.random(99); }

Again, copy paste it beneath it, and change the id again. Then change the 99 to your own max hit.

Finally search forif (npcs[NPCID].npcType != 117 &&

And copy paste it behind it and change the npc id and you’re all done.

Read full topic
